citeinfo.title: Karnataka, India : State Assembly Constituency Boundaries and Election Data, 1989-2004

descript.abstract: This datalayer shows state Legislative Assembly constituency boundaries and data relating to the past four Assembly elections (1989, 1994, 1999, 2004) for the State of Karnataka, India. Includes attribute data on election parties, candidates, voters, and results.This layer is part of the PollMap of India dataset published by ML InfoMap which includes parliamentary constituency boundaries for India, Assembly constituency boundaries for all states, and data relating to the past four national elections for each State of India. This data layer is sourced from secondary government sources, chiefly Survey of India, Census of India, Election Commission, etc. Scale 1:1,000,000.
descript.purpose: This data can be used for election analysis, forecasting, and mapping: Enables profiling of individual constituencies, permits historical analysis of the data, and helps predictive estimate of the impact of regional and state-wise electorate swings on the performance of political parties. These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production.

idinfo.accconst: Access is granted to Harvard University Affiliates only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff and students.

citeinfo.title: Report on the General Elections to the Legislative Assemblies of the Andhra Pradesh, Assam, Bihar, Gujarat, Himachal Pradesh, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Manipur, Orissa, Punjab, Rajasthan, Sikkim Tamil Nadu, Uttar Pradesh, Arunachal Pradesh, Goa, Daman & Diu, and Pondicherry, 1984-85.
Report on the General Elections to the Legislative Assemblies of the Haryana, Jammu & Kashmir, Kerala, Mizoram, Nagaland and West Bengal, 1987 and detailed results of bye-elections held in 1986-1987.
Report on the General Elections to the Legislative Assemblies of Meghalaya and Tripura and on the Bye-Elections to the house of the people and Legislative Assemblies held in 1988

Report on the General Elections to the Legislative Assemblies of Anhra Pradesh, Arunachal Pradesh, Bihar Goa, Gujarat, Himichal Pradesh, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Manipur, Orissa, Rajasthan, Sikkim, Uttar Pradesh and Pondicherry, 1989-90, and Bye-Elections to the Legislative Assemblies held in 1989-90.
Report on the General Elections to the Legislative Assemblies of Tamil Nadu, Mizoram and Nagaland and Bye-election to the Legislative Assembliesheld in 1989

Report on the General Elections to the Legislative Assemblies of Assam, Haryana, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal and Pondicherry, 1991 and Bye-elections to the Legislative Assemblies held in 1991
Report on the General election to the Legislative Assembly from Punjab State 1992

Report on the General Elections to the Legislative Assemblies of Delhi, Himachal Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Meghalya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Rajasthan, Tripura and Uttar Pradesh held in 1993 and Bye-elections to the Legislative Assemblies in 1993-94
PollMap
citeinfo.othercit: IndiaMap includes socio-demographic and economic Census data for 2001 at the State, District, Sub-District, and Town levels.

citeinfo.title: India GIS data in ESRI SHP format

procstep.procdesc: The data was downloaded from the vendor's server as shape files with ZIP compression. The files were uncompressed using WinZip and loaded into SDE using ArcCatalog 9.2 service pack 5.
